Node.Query: SELECT P.lPortfolioItemId, M.Name, M.sShortName, P.sTGLongName, SubC.Name, C.Name, P.dbTGInvoiceCostNDS, S.sName, L.sTGRegion + ', ' + L.sTGCountry + ', ' + L.sTGCity + ', ' + L.sTGStreet FROM amPortfolio P LEFT JOIN amCaterory SubC ON (P.ligSubCategoryId = SubC.lCateroryId) LEFT JOIN amCaterory C ON (SubC.lParentId = C.lCateroryId) LEFT JOIN amIGStatus S ON (P.ligStatusId = P.ligStatusId) LEFT JOIN amLocation L ON (L.lLocaId = P.lTGLocationId) LEFT JOIN amModel M ON (P.lModelId = M.lModelId) WHERE P.lPortfolioItemId =
